exceptions.message:
SQLSTATE[42P01]: Undefined table: 7 ERROR:  missing FROM-clause entry for table "terceros"
LINE 1: ...ers"."id" from "orders" inner join "customers" on "terceros"...
                                                             ^ (SQL: select "customers"."id" from "orders" inner join "customers" on "terceros"."email" = "customers"."last_name" inner join "orders" on "orders"."customer_id" = "customers"."customer_id" where "terceros"."email" = admin@admin.com and "terceros"."state" = 1)

statements.sql: select "id", "identificacion", "nombres", "apellidos", "email" from "terceros" where "terceros"."deleted_at" is null and "state" = '1' order by "id" asc

select "terceros_networks"."customer_id" from "terceros_networks" inner join "terceros" on "terceros"."customer_id" = "terceros_networks"."customer_id" where "terceros_networks"."padre_id" = '1' and "terceros"."state" = '1'
